text: Kim Kardashian West hopped onto Snapchat to defend her husband Kanye West's honor tonight, posting a series of videos that prove Taylor Swift gave West permission to rap about her on infamous The Life of Pablo single ` ` Famous.'' ( The line in question : ` ` For all my Southside niggas that know me best / I feel like me and Taylor might still have sex / I made that bitch famous.'' ) Kardashian teased the reveal on Twitter earlier in the evening, and West's feud with Swift was the basis for one of the major plotlines on tonight's episode of Keeping Up with the Kardashians.
